title: How old were the characters during the first season of Friends?

og.title: How old were the characters during the first season of Friends?
og.description: Answer (1 of 9): A lot of these answers already explain quite well the inconsistencies in the characters’ ages, particularly Monica who is assumed to be the same age as Rachel (24) in Season 1 but goes on to say multiple times in the same season that she’s 26. Knowing Ross is her older brother an...
